summary: This is a forwarded email from August 11, 2019, requesting information about the SHU Lieutenant at the institution where Jeffrey Epstein was held, specifically inquiring if they were present on the preceding Friday and their work hours. The message appears to be part of internal communications following Epstein's death.

events.title: Information Request Regarding SHU Lieutenant
events.description: An email is sent requesting information about the Special Housing Unit (SHU) Lieutenant at the institution, asking if they were present the previous Friday and what their work hours were.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated August 11, 2019, sent shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It requests specific information about a Special Housing Unit (SHU) Lieutenant's presence and schedule at the institution, indicating an internal inquiry was underway.
The correspondence is addressed to a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) email address, confirming it as part of official BOP communications.
